name: golangci-lint
description: Installs golangci-lint and adds it to the global PATH.

version.description: The specific version to install; default value is 'latest' which will install the most recent available release of golangci-lint. NOTE: If a version is provided and a matching release can not be found the feature will fail.

installFromGitHubRelease.description: When true, force pulling releases directly from published GitHub tarball regardless of the default installation method.
